channel.title: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?
channel.description: Well the "G" in my ancients box is vengeance but I want it to be the vengeance symbol and I ahve that symbol in my sprites folder...it is named vengeance

item.title: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Skittle, this is in the wrong section. Consider moving it to Client Help to get more assistance.

item.source: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?

item.title: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

You said you have a picture of that G in your sprites folder?

Then just open that picture in paint or something, find a picture on google of the vengance icon, and paste it over the g and boom it will be a vengance symbol

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?

item.title: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Some of the icon names are also loaded from the cache so you won’t be able to find it by looking for the actual name in a file.
I dumped the names and dimensions of every sprite, so I know it’s there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?

item.title: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

No I searched for magicOn and MagicOff in there but nothing and then I searched another client and nothing

item.source: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?

item.title: How do I get the "G" for ancients to be a vengeance symbol?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Sprites named magicOn/magicOff and magicOn2/magicOff2 are loaded from the cache in Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.
Find out which ones are the teleport to ghorrack icon by disabling some of them from loading.

Read full topic
